suncertify.ui
Class ContractorTableModel

java.lang.Object
  javax.swing.table.AbstractTableModel
      suncertify.ui.ContractorTableModel
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable, javax.swing.table.TableModel
public class ContractorTableModel
extends javax.swing.table.AbstractTableModel

Table model for contractors data retrieved from the database. Table model contains columns representing contractors data as following: "Name", "Location", "Specialities", "Size", "Rate", "Owner".

Author:
Szymon Bochniak (bochniak.szymon@gmail.com)
See Also:
